snippet.title: Shot fired into Warilla home
snippet.content:
Police are appealing for information after a shot was fired into a house at Warilla on Tuesday morning.
Two men approached a home on Trumper Street and knocked on the front door about 12.30am. A male occupant answered and an altercation occurred between the three men, police said. A shot was fired into the front window of the home before the two men fled the scene; no one was injured.
They were seen getting into a white sedan that quickly left the area. Lake Illawarra police are investigating. Anyone with information is urged to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
A shot was fired into a Warilla home overnight. Picture: Google Maps
